attributes.action: STOP PENILISING FAMILIES WHO NEED LARGER CARS, AS OPPOSED TO USING THEM AS STATUS SYMBOLS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: childern car seat laws mean families with 4 or more children have no choice but to use a large car, e.g. people carrier, yet we are taxed in the same bracket as those who unnecessarily drive larger so called 'gas guzzlers'. the government should rebate such families, especially those living in rural areas, who have no choice but to rely on their own transport and who only drive responsibly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
